title: Implement read operations in LocalCommsClient
description:
Implement the 6 read operations in comms/local.ts:

- fetchInfo() -> GET /api/info
- fetchTick(id) -> GET /api/ticks/:id
- fetchActivity(limit) -> GET /api/activity?limit=N
- fetchRecord(tickId) -> GET /api/records/:tickId (return null on 404)
- fetchRunStatus(epicId) -> GET /api/run-status/:epicId
- fetchContext(epicId) -> GET /api/context/:epicId (return null on 404, returns text not JSON)

Add tests to local.test.ts for these operations.
closed_reason: Implemented 6 read operations in LocalCommsClient + extended test rig, 30 tests passing
